properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM TB_QNA WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT QNA_NO , NICKNAME , QNA_TITLE , TO_CHAR(QNA_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "QNA_DATE" , COUNT FROM TB_QNA Q JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE Q.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
